post.author: 이성기
post.content:
One of my agents had 4 full-time roles come in for Toronto and N.Y. city.
Maybe you are interested? I need:
J2EE/Weblogic gurus (2 Toronto, 1 N.Y. City) Java Swing UI Guru (N.Y. City) This is urgent... If you are interested in, please send memo or contact me
You have to send me resume first, not directly to this agent. Then they won't accept you..
If you need more description...
http://www.gurulink.ca/AspPages/candidate_/viewjob.asp?JobID=205 N.Y. http://www.gurulink.ca/AspPages/candidate_/viewjob.asp?JobID=206 Toronto http://www.gurulink.ca/AspPages/candidate_/viewjob.asp?JobID=207 N.Y.
post.title: 3 J2EE/Weblogic developers and 1 Swing developer needed
